description: This file defines a URLReader class that fetches content from URLs, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations, and creates Document objects from the fetched content.

classes.name: URLReader
classes.description: A class for reading content from URLs, supporting retries and asynchronous operations.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the URLReader with an optional proxy and additional keyword arguments.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Synchronously reads content from a URL, with retry logic, and returns a list of Document objects.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads content from a URL, with retry logic, and returns a list of Document objects.

methods.name: _create_document
methods.description: Creates a Document object from a URL and its content.
